terms.agree: By submitting your order, you agree to our

trust.donateTree: We invite you to donate {amount} {currency} to fund a tree?

trust.pciDss: Marketplace follows the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) when handling card data
trust.cardSecure: Card information is secure and uncompromised
trust.noSell: Marketplace never sells your card information
trust.securePrivacyDesc: Protecting your privacy is important to us. Please be assured that your information will be kept secured and uncompromised. We do not sell your personal information for money and will only use your information in accordance with our privacy and cookie policy to provide and improve our services to you.
trust.purchaseProtectionDesc: Shop confidently on Marketplace knowing that if something goes wrong, we've always got your back.

list.noOrdersDesc: You haven't placed any orders yet.

tracking.title: Tracking

reorder.desc: We will merge items from this order with your cart (won't duplicate on repeated reorders).

cancel.confirm: Are you sure you want to cancel this order? This action cannot be undone.

consequences.marked: Order will be marked as cancelled
consequences.refunded: Payment will be refunded (if already paid)

youWillNotBeCharged: You will not be charged until you review this order on the next page.
securityReminder: Security reminder: Please be wary of scam messages and links. GloTrade won't ask for extra fees via SMS or email.

security.modalMessage: GloTrade values your privacy and security. We will never send requests for extra payments by SMS or email. If you receive any requests claiming to be from GloTrade, we strongly suggest you ignore them and do not click on any links they may contain.
security.reportSuspicious: If you come across anything suspicious, please report it in time

todo.title: What you need to do:
todo.item2: Wait for shipped orders to be delivered
todo.item3: Cancel orders if they cannot be completed

why.title: Why this matters:
why.desc: We need to protect both you and your customers. Unsettled orders could result in financial disputes, incomplete transactions, or customer service issues. Once all orders are resolved, you can safely delete your account.

deletionModal.emailSentDesc: We've sent a reactivation link to:
deletionModal.todoStep1: Check your email inbox (and spam folder)
deletionModal.todoStep2: Click the reactivation link in the email
deletionModal.todoStep3: Your account will be restored immediately
deletionModal.todoStep4: You can then log in normally
deletionModal.helpDesc: If you don't receive the email within a few minutes, check your spam folder or contact support.
